attributes.action: Steer the UK towards a circular economy for recovery
attributes.additional_details:
Give our children a better future where the planet they rely on matters
Provide shops on high streets where people can take items to go back into use or be fixed creating new jobs and skils
attributes.background:
Be regenerative by design, retaining as much value as possible from products, parts and materials.
Mitigate the climate impact of continually manufacturing new products.
Recoup the £4 trillion wasted in the current take-make-waste consumer model.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to take a certain approach to the economic recovery from Covid-19, but it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Rebuild the economy out of lockdown with a Green New Deal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317343
